Status.Message:
ΝΕΑ ΕΝΗΜΕΡΩΣΗ ΔΙΑΘΕΣΙΜΗ: v1.0.1
Παρακαλούμε ενημερώστε την εφαρμογή μέσω του Google Play Store, προκειμένου να συνεχίσετε να απολαμβάνετε νέο υλικό!

Rating.InfoText:
The specific application provides users with the ability to have direct access to a collection of movies, which come from sources that are freely available on the internet. The main goal of this particular application is to facilitate the discovery of movies on a global level.
*By installing this specific application, users accept the full disclaimer of creators from any legal liability regarding intellectual property rights, as third-party sources of audiovisual material, provided for free on the internet, are used within the application. Any legitimate holder of intellectual property rights who wishes to remove any movie included within this specific application must contact the development team before taking any legal action.
